channel.title: CVE Feed for Web357 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Web357 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-32540|2024-07-24T19:15:19.694Z -- web357 -- fixed%20html%20toolbar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Web357 Fixed HTML Toolbar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Fixed HTML Toolbar: from n/a through 1.0.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-37536|2024-07-21T07:05:57.917Z -- web357 -- easy%20custom%20code%20%28less%2Fcss%2Fjs%29%20%E2%80%93%20live%20editing
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Web357 Easy Custom Code (LESS/CSS/JS) – Live editing allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Easy Custom Code (LESS/CSS/JS) – Live editing: from n/a through 1.0.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-32540|2024-04-17T08:30:16.574Z -- web357 -- fixed%20html%20toolbar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Web357 Fixed HTML Toolbar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Fixed HTML Toolbar: from n/a through 1.0.7.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Web357 Easy Custom Code (LESS/CSS/JS) – Live editing allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Easy Custom Code (LESS/CSS/JS) – Live editing: from n/a through 1.0.8.
